    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Collisions between trolleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstöße zwischen Laufkatzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collisions entre les chariots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colisões entre troles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scontri fra i carrelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρούσεις μεταξύ των καροτσακιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colisiones entre las carretillas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show elastic (left) and inelastic (right) collisions between a moving and a stationary trolley.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inelastic collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">springy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stationary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sticky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trolley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die elastischen (link) 
und unelastischen (rechten) Zusammenstöße zwischen einem Bewegen und
einer stationären Laufkatze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent (bonnes) les collisions
élastiques (gauche) et non élastiques entre se déplacer et un 
chariot stationnaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram as colisões 
(direitas) elásticas (esquerdo) e inelastic entre mover-se e um trole
estacionário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano (giusti) gli scontri
elastici (di sinistra) ed anelastici fra muoversi e un carrello 
stazionario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν ελαστικές 
(αριστερός) και ανελαστικές (δεξιά) συγκρούσεις μεταξύ μιας 
κίνησης και ενός στάσιμου καροτσακιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran las colisiones 
(derechas) elásticos (izquierdo) e inelásticas entre una mudanza y 
una carretilla inmóvil.</string>
          </description>
